text: aur un logon ka peechha karane mein sustee na dikhao. yadi tumhen dukh pahunchata hai; to unhen bhee dukh pahunchata hai, jis tarah tumako dukh pahunchata hai. aur tum allaah se us cheez kee aasha karate ho, jis cheez kee ve aasha nahin karate. allaah to sab kuchh jaananevaala, tatvadarshee hai
